mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notice ( notice_title, notice_content, regist_date, admin_id ) VALUES ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT subquery.* FROM (SELECT tbl_notice.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY regist_date DESC, notice_no DESC) AS rownum FROM tbl_notice) AS subquery LIMIT ${perPage} OFFSET ${startPage}
